=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 hour 30 mins -
3 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 1 hour -
2 hours || 9 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 40 mins -
1 hour 20 mins || 6 mulch |}
